decision_conditions: The proposed rear canopy, by reason of its excessive depth, would create cumulative impact together with the approved single storey rear extension under permission no. 240527HH granted on 04.04.2024, being insubordinate to the host building, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwelling and local area. As such, the proposal is contrary policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19), and Ealing Housing Design Guidance (2022).
description: Demolition and reconstruction of previously approved scheme; single storey rear extension; creation of steps to rear elevation; front extension; excavation to lower ground floor and creation of lightwell (following removal of front bay window); first floor rear extension incorporating Juliet balcony; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony, installation of one rooflight to rear roof slope and installation of five rooflights to front roof slope; installation of window to side roof slope; replacement of rear first floor windows; replacement of two windows to first floor front elevation with new window; demolition of outbuilding; with associated external alterations. Ground floor 4m rear glass canopy, existing front wall to be rebuilt in white brick.
